citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"c7ed21cc-ae2e-44ee-bb79-197755ca29db\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Cascadia Seaweed Corporation\"}, {\"literal\": \"Ocean Networks Canada Society\"}, {\"literal\": \"Uchucklesaht Tribe Government\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"07\", \"06\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Ce Turner Cyclops-7F Fluorometer (S/N 900293) a \u00e9t\u00e9 d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 le 2022-03-08 au Ferme Cascadia Seaweed \u00e0 la pointe Burrough. La ferme de la pointe Burrough est une ferme commerciale d\u00e9di\u00e9e \u00e0 la culture d'algues dans la baie de Barkley. Cet instrument est un Turbidim\u00e8tre. Les turbidim\u00e8tres sont des capteurs qui d\u00e9tectent la lumi\u00e8re diffus\u00e9e par les particules en suspension dans l'eau. La quantit\u00e9 de lumi\u00e8re diffus\u00e9e qui atteint le d\u00e9tecteur est proportionnelle \u00e0 la turbidit\u00e9 ou \u00e0 la concentration de particules dans l'eau. Il a \u00e9t\u00e9 deploy\u00e9 sur une plateforme fixe. Les donn\u00e9es de ce d\u00e9ploiement sont archiv\u00e9es et accessibles sur l\u2019infrastructure num\u00e9rique Oceans 3.0 du R\u00e9seau Canadien des Oc\u00e9ans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualit\u00e9 et produits d\u00e9riv\u00e9s selon les conventions \u00e9tablies.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Ferme Cascadia Seaweed \u00e0 la pointe Burrough Turbidim\u00e8tre d\u00e9ploy\u00e9 2022-03-08\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"http://ckan.onc.uvic.ca/dataset/c7ed21cc-ae2e-44ee-bb79-197755ca29db?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"c7ed21cc-ae2e-44ee-bb79-197755ca29db\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"Cascadia Seaweed Corporation\"}, {\"literal\": \"Ocean Networks Canada Society\"}, {\"literal\": \"Uchucklesaht Tribe Government\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2024\", \"07\", \"06\"]}], \"abstract\": \"The Turner Cyclops-7F Fluorometer (S/N 900293) was deployed on 2022-03-08 at Cascadia Seaweed Burrough Point Farm. The Burrough Point Farm is a commercial farm used for cultivating seaweed in Barkley Sound. This device is a Turbidity Meter. Turbidity meters are sensors that detect scattered light from suspended particles in water. The amount of scattered light that reaches the detector is proportional to the turbidity or particle concentration in the water. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Cascadia Seaweed Burrough Point Farm Turbidity Meter Deployed 2022-03-08\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"http://ckan.onc.uvic.ca/dataset/c7ed21cc-ae2e-44ee-bb79-197755ca29db?local=en\"}]

          </mcc:codeSpace>
          <mcc:description>
            <gco:CharacterString>The EPSG Geodetic Parameter Dataset is a structured dataset of Coordinate Reference Systems and Coordinate Transformations, accessible through this online registry (www.epsg-registry.org) or, as downloadable zip files, through IOGP's EPSG home page at www.epsg.org. The geographic coverage of the data is worldwide, but it is stressed that the dataset does not and cannot record all possible geodetic parameters in use around the world.</gco:CharacterString>

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>The Turner Cyclops-7F Fluorometer (S/N 900293) was deployed on 2022-03-08 at Cascadia Seaweed Burrough Point Farm. The Burrough Point Farm is a commercial farm used for cultivating seaweed in Barkley Sound. This device is a Turbidity Meter. Turbidity meters are sensors that detect scattered light from suspended particles in water. The amount of scattered light that reaches the detector is proportional to the turbidity or particle concentration in the water. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="fra">Ce Turner Cyclops-7F Fluorometer (S/N 900293) a été déployé le 2022-03-08 au Ferme Cascadia Seaweed à la pointe Burrough. La ferme de la pointe Burrough est une ferme commerciale dédiée à la culture d'algues dans la baie de Barkley. Cet instrument est un Turbidimètre. Les turbidimètres sont des capteurs qui détectent la lumière diffusée par les particules en suspension dans l'eau. La quantité de lumière diffusée qui atteint le détecteur est proportionnelle à la turbidité ou à la concentration de particules dans l'eau. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme fixe. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>
      <mri:status>
        <mcc:MD_ProgressCode codeList="http://standards.iso.org/iso/19115/resources/Codelist/cat/codelists.xml#MD_ProgressCode" codeListValue="completed"/>
      </mri:status>
      <mri:topicCategory>
        <mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>oceans</mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>
      </mri:topicCategory>

                  <cit:onlineResource>

          </mac:identifier>
          <mac:type>
            <gco:CharacterString>Turner Designs Cyclops-7F fluorometer</gco:CharacterString>
          </mac:type>
          <mac:description>
            <gco:CharacterString>A high performance in situ fluorometer which can be configured and factory scaled for various fluorometric analyses. These include detection of blue-green algae (phycocyanin, phycoerythrin), CDOM/FDOM, fluroescent dye tracing (fluorescein, rhodamine, PTSA), hydrocarbons (crude oil, refined fuels), wastewater monitoring (optical brighteners, tryptophan), turbidity, and chlorophyll in vivo (blue excitation, red excitation). Custom optics are available between 260-900 nm. Depending on the configuration, the Cyclops-7F has a minimum detection limit ranging from 0.1-3 ppb and a linear range between 0-20 ppm and 0-5000 ppb. The instrument can be used in depths up to 600 m and in water temperatures of -2 to 50 degC.</gco:CharacterString>
          </mac:description>
        </mac:MI_Instrument>
      </mac:instrument>
    </mac:MI_AcquisitionInformation>
  </mdb:acquisitionInformation>

name: c7ed21cc-ae2e-44ee-bb79-197755ca29db
notes: The Turner Cyclops-7F Fluorometer (S/N 900293) was deployed on 2022-03-08 at Cascadia Seaweed Burrough Point Farm. The Burrough Point Farm is a commercial farm used for cultivating seaweed in Barkley Sound. This device is a Turbidity Meter. Turbidity meters are sensors that detect scattered light from suspended particles in water. The amount of scattered light that reaches the detector is proportional to the turbidity or particle concentration in the water. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.

notes_translated.en: The Turner Cyclops-7F Fluorometer (S/N 900293) was deployed on 2022-03-08 at Cascadia Seaweed Burrough Point Farm. The Burrough Point Farm is a commercial farm used for cultivating seaweed in Barkley Sound. This device is a Turbidity Meter. Turbidity meters are sensors that detect scattered light from suspended particles in water. The amount of scattered light that reaches the detector is proportional to the turbidity or particle concentration in the water. It was deployed on a fixed platform. Data from this deployment were archived and made available through Ocean Networks Canada's Oceans 3.0 digital infrastructure, with quality assurance and derived data products following established practices.
notes_translated.fr: Ce Turner Cyclops-7F Fluorometer (S/N 900293) a été déployé le 2022-03-08 au Ferme Cascadia Seaweed à la pointe Burrough. La ferme de la pointe Burrough est une ferme commerciale dédiée à la culture d'algues dans la baie de Barkley. Cet instrument est un Turbidimètre. Les turbidimètres sont des capteurs qui détectent la lumière diffusée par les particules en suspension dans l'eau. La quantité de lumière diffusée qui atteint le détecteur est proportionnelle à la turbidité ou à la concentration de particules dans l'eau. Il a été deployé sur une plateforme fixe. Les données de ce déploiement sont archivées et accessibles sur l’infrastructure numérique Oceans 3.0 du Réseau Canadien des Océans (ONC), avec assurance de la qualité et produits dérivés selon les conventions établies.

description_translated.en: The Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System (CIOOS) Pacific is the regional hub of the National CIOOS for ocean data aggregation on Canada’s west coast.
description_translated.fr: Le Système intégré d’observation des océans canadien (SIOOC) Pacifique est la plaque tournante régionale du SIOOC national pour l’agrégation des données océaniques sur la côte ouest du Canada.

title: Cascadia Seaweed Burrough Point Farm Turbidity Meter Deployed 2022-03-08

description.fr: Accueil des données canadiennes sur l'océan Pacifique
description.en: Home of Canada's Pacific Ocean Data

resources.description: Data is delivered via ERDDAP, a data server that gives a standardized way to download subsets of datasets in common file formats. This particular ERDDAP installation has oceanographic data from Ocean Networks Canada's instruments
